name: FrameWork Cloud Services LLC
tag_list: hosted-virtual-desktop-hvdi, back-up--recovery, email--communication, server-hosting-iaas, file-sharing--collaboration, software-as-a-service-saas, unified-communications-voip
overview:
FrameWork is a business productivity company specializing in cloud solutions.

Our aim is two fold

1) to clear the hype around the cloud & find real solutions that benefit your business’s bottom line

2) to distinguish ourselves from other providers through personal attention and service

We firmly understand that short-term gains will sacrifice long-term stability. Our team shares the core philosophy that, even in the world of high technology and big business, everything still boils down to personal relationships. In today’s world of transparency, nobody is fooled by smoke & mirrors. Putting tag-lines such as ‘Service First’ or ‘Because We Care’ on a website is lip-service if you don’t have the passion to drive your client’s business as if it were your own.

Specialties

Hosted Virtual Desktop (HVDI), Back-Up & Recovery, Email & Communication, Server Hosting (IaaS), File Sharing & Collaboration, Software as a Service (SaaS), Unified Communications (VOIP)
